newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss Q1 GDP expected on Thursday, June 12.
newsitem.headline: Swiss Q1 GDP expected on Thursday, June 12.

text.p: The Swiss Federal Office for Economic Issues (BAKF) said it expects to release Swiss first quarter gross domestic product (GDP) data on Thursday, June 12.
A spokesman for the office also said there was a small chance the GDP would not be released until June 13 but said Thursday was a more likely release date.
The time for the release is expected to be 0600 GMT.
According to an average forecast, Swiss banks surveyed by Reuters mid-May expected first quarter GDP to show a slight gain of 0.3 percent versus a weak fourth quarter 1996.
Compared with the first quarter 1996, the GDP was expected to decline 0.4 percent according to the average forecast. -- Zurich Editorial, +41 1 631 7340
